name: Private Full-Day Trip to Kakku from Inle
description: More than 2,000 hillside stupas — simply designed or richly adorned with carved deities — comprise the Kakku pagodas. Visit the complex with a private guide who sheds like on its Buddhist history dating back in the 3rd century. See this awe-inspiring scene, reached via a boat ride from Inle Lake and a drive to Taunggyi. Lunch and a visit to a Pa-O village are included with private transport.
